attributes.action: Make owners of HMOs pay business tax rates and or council tax
attributes.additional_details: Maybe there wouldn’t be as much pollution in the community areas. Stop people having a horrible time of it.
attributes.background: Perhaps their view on properties would change due to better care of property

rejection.details:
Petitions need to clearly ask the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition that more clearly explains what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You will need to give your full name to start a petition.
